com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface ICodeService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
CodeService
public interface ICodeService
extends IService

The interface for the CodeService class The CodeService class provides remote services to manipuate code objects in the database.

Method Detail

createCode

Code createCode(PCSession session,
                java.lang.String sCodeID,
                java.lang.String sAuthor,
                java.util.Date dCreationDate,
                java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                java.lang.String sName,
                java.lang.String sDescription,
                java.lang.String sBehavior)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
Adds a new code to the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sCodeID, the code id for the particular code object
String - sAuthor, the author of this code
Date - dCreationDate, the creation date of this code
Date - dModificationDate, the modification date
String - sName, the value of the code name
String - sDescription, the value of the code description
String - sBehavior, the value of the code behavior
Returns:
Code, the newly created Code object from the data placed in the database.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

delete

boolean delete(PCSession session,
               java.lang.String sCodeID)
               throws java.sql.SQLException
Delete a code with the given code id from the database and returns it if successful

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sCodeID, the code id for the particular code object
Returns:
boolean, indicating if the deletion of the code was successful.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException, - if something went wrong.
java.sql.SQLException
